SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM t_user) count_user, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_admin) count_admin, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_manufacturer) count_manufacturer, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_mobile_phone) count_mobile_phone, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_sale) count_sale;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y/%m/%d') day, count(*) count FROM t_login_log GROUP BY day;
SELECT m.id,m.name,count(*) comment FROM t_mobile_phone m JOIN t_comment c ON m.id=c.mobile_phone GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY comment DESC LIMIT 0,10;
SELECT m.id,m.name,(SELECT count(*)FROM t_comment com WHERE com.mobile_phone=m.id) comment, (SELECT count(*)FROM t_collection con WHERE con.mobile_phone=m.id) collection FROM t_mobile_phone m
